title: The 'Cobra Kai' cast reveal their ultimate Sekai Taikai squads
content: Tanner Buchanan, Peyton List, Jacob Bertrand, Mary Mouser and Gianni DeCenzo reveal who they would pick as their ultimate Sekai Taikai squads.
